channel.title: Adrian de Lima | Musician
channel.description: Recent content on Adrian de Lima | Musician

item.title: Moon River
item.description: Moon River composed by Henry Mancini with lyrics by Johnny Mercer, here arranged by Denny Wang and performed by Adrian de Lima and Toby Baker. We performed this piece to celebrate graduating from the University of Birmingham, featuring the university’s iconic clock tower Old Joe playing the role of the moon. I hope you enjoy! Socials: /adriandelima.music https://adriandelima.github.io/ @AdriandelimaMusic @tobyb1506 @nicolegisbourne Lyrics: Moon river, wider than a mile I'm crossing you in style someday (Someday, day) A dream maker (Maker, maker) My heartbreaker (You heartbreaker) Wherever you're goin', I'm goin' that way (The same, the same) Two drifters off to see the world There's such a crazy world to see We're all chasin' after all the same Chasin' after our ends Moon river, wider than a mile Crossin' in style someday My dream maker, heartbreaker Wherever you're goin', I'm goin' the same Two drifters off to see the world It's such a crazy world, you'll see (What I see, who I become) (What I see, who I become) We're all chasin' after our ends Chasin' after our ends Life's just around the bend, my friend Moon river and me Featured Comments Many thanks to all those who helped me put this one together, Toby, Nicole, Tevin, Noa.

item.title: Welcome to my new website
item.description: Welcome to Adrian de Lima’s new website Hello world, and welcome to my new portfolio website. My name is Adrian Ethan de Lima, and I am an expert musician based in the UK. Following my studies at the University of Birmingham, I thought it would be handy to showcase music for you all on a website. I got my brother Darthagnon of Machine Men to make me a website, following earlier discussions around Christmas.

item.title: Wylde Green Concert
item.description: An evening of concert featuring Lalo & Bridge by Adrian de Lima and Toby Baker at Wylde Green United Reformed Church. On 16th Feb 2025, I performed a selection of minatures by Frank Bridge, and Lalo’s Symphony Espagnole, at Wylde Green United Reformed Church. Many thanks to all who came to support, to my accompanist, colleague and friend Toby Baker, and the team at Wylde Green and UoB Music, for the opportunity to put on this programme, we had an awesome time!

item.title: Mary, Did You Know? Christmas 2024 music video
item.description: An arrangement of the popular Christmas song “Mary did you know?” performed by myself and my brother Kevin. Merry Crimble everyone! Lyrics Mary did you know That your baby boy Would one day walk on water? Mary did you know That your baby boy Would save our sons and daughters? Did you know That your baby boy Has come to make you new? This child that you've delivered Will soon deliver you Mary did you know That your baby boy Would give sight to a blind man?

item.title: A Mother and Child by the Sea
item.description: Living much of his life in Dresden, Dahl never forgot his Norwegian homeland, basing a lot of his landscape work off of his memories of the landscape and trips home (jonathan5485, 2011). His Mother and Child by the Sea was painted during a difficult time in his life, not long after the deaths of a lot of his family, and the same year that his great friend and inspiration Caspar Friedrich passed away.

item.title: The Lord's Prayer music video
item.description: Malotte’s The Lord’s Prayer Composed in 1935 by Albert Hay Malotte, The Lord’s Prayer sets the classic prayer given by Christ in Matthew 6 to song. This rendition is sung by my father, with myself at the piano. Lyrics: Our Father, Which art in heaven, Hallowed be Thy name, Thy kingdom come Thy will be done, On earth As it is In Heaven. Give us this day, Our daily bread. And forgive us our debts, As we Forgive our debtors.

item.title: Christmas Moosic '23
item.description: Merry Chrimble Published on YouTube by Kevin de Lima.

item.title: Christmas Moosic
item.description: No description has been added to this video. Published on YouTube by Kevin de Lima.

item.title: Practice violin exam, 2019
item.description: Throughout his musical career, Adrian de Lima has successfully passed many exams according to the standards set by both the Spanish and British music boards. He started his musical studies with private piano lessons in Sóller, Mallorca, before continuing with violin and piano at the Escola Municipal de Música de Sóller. Upon return to the UK, he continued his studies privately in piano and violin under the standards set by the ABRSM (Associated Board of the Royal Schools of Music).

item.title: Jaime Jorge concert collaboration (2019)
item.description: Towards the end of 2019, my little brother Adrian played in a concert starring Jaime Jorge, a well-known Adventist musician with a music ministry that takes him around the world. The concert was organised by Pastor James Shepley of Cheltenham Seventh-Day Adventist Church. I was studying at Newbold College of Higher Education on the Year In Mission program, and decided to drive down to see the concert with my friend and classmate Jan.

item.title: June 2019 Concert
item.description: Track 1, JS Bach: Partita no.1 BWV 825, Praeludium and Gigue - 2019-06-10 16:26:50 Adrian played a piano concert on the afternoon of 10 June 2019. The videos were filmed by family, and originally uploaded 17 October 2019 to the alt account @neusymardelima6509 (Archive on PreserveTube). Please enjoy the full playlist of songs: JS Bach: Partita no.1 BWV 825, Praeludium and Gigue - 2019-06-10 16:26:50 L van Beethoven: Sonata in G major Op 14 no.

item.title: February 2019 Concert
item.description: Track 1, “Gopak” - Modeste Mussorgsky - 2019-02-14 18:31:51 Adrian playing in a Blue School concert, on the evening of 14 February 2019. The videos were filmed by family, and originally uploaded 11 June 2019 to the alt account @neusymardelima6509 (Archive on PreserveTube). Here is the full playlist of songs: “Gopak” - Modeste Mussorgsky - 2019-02-14 18:31:51 “Dance of the tumblers” - Rimsky-Korsakov - 2019-02-14 18:34:28 “Molly on the shore” - Percy Grainger - 2019-02-14 18:41:31 “Star Wars” - John Williams - 2019-02-14 18:55:42 “Somerset folksong rhapsody” - 2019-02-14 18:47:46 “The greatest showman” - Pasek, Paul and Lewis - 2019-02-14 19:05:24 “Westside Story” - Bernstein - 2019-02-14 19:07:04 “Amparito Roca” - Teixidor - 2019-02-14 18:27:07 (or, as a YouTube playlist).
